translated: The Buddha Speaks the Great Vajra Fragrance DhÄraá¹‡Ä« SÅ«tra
Tripiá¹­aka Master from the Western Regions, Chao-san-ta-fu Shih-hung-lu Shao-qing
Dharma-transmitting Great Master, Subject Shi Hu, Respectfully Translated by Imperial Order
At that time, the World-Honored One
Recited this great mantra,
Which can subdue all celestial luminaries.
This vajra fragrance
Is greatly powerful and supreme, like a vajra jewel.
It has great utility and can destroy all mountains.
If there are supreme luminaries that do not submit, simply recite this vajra fragrance mantra.
Celestial luminaries and so forth will be frightened, terrified, and submit themselves.
Like a tree branch blown by the wind, it will bend low with the wind.
Then he spoke the dhÄraá¹‡Ä«, saying:
